meanings.definition: Arguing or quarreling over trivial matters.
meanings.sent1: The bickering siblings couldn't agree on which TV show to watch.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors were bickering about whose turn it was to mow the lawn.
meanings.sent3: The bickering puppies fought over the smallest bone in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The bickering birds squabbled over the last worm in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The bickering students argued over who got to use the red crayon first.

meanings.definition: Engaging in petty disputes or disagreements.
meanings.sent1: The bickering couple couldn't decide on a restaurant for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The coworkers were bickering over the office temperature.
meanings.sent3: The bickering friends playfully argued about their favorite ice cream flavors.
meanings.sent4: The bickering politicians couldn't reach a compromise on the new law.
meanings.sent5: The bickering team members disagreed on the best strategy for the game.
